boardgame.name: The Manhattan Project 2: Minutes to Midnight
El Proyecto Manhattan 2: Minutos para la Medianoche
boardgame.description: 20 years after the end of The Manhattan Project, the superpowers of the world are embroiled in another vicious arms race. Manufacturing nukes is no longer an obstacle; all nations are now capable of churning them out at a rapid pace. The challenge of this era lies in the development of various delivery systems called the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Nuclear Triad:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; strategic bombers, ballistic subs, and land-based ballistic missiles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player represents one of the superpowers in the arms race. At staged intervals, scoring is conducted in one of 4 categories:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Strategic Bombers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Ballistic Submarines_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- ICBMs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Short-range missiles deployed to third world nations_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In addition to earning points for deploying nukes during the scoring rounds, players can also earn defensive bonuses for mitigating the risks imposed against them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends after all of the scoring events have been completed. The player with the most points is the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To help along the way, you will recruit 4 different kinds of workers:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Laborers, which operate your buildings_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Spies, which operate your opponents' buildings for your gain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Politicians, which produce tax revenue and gain control over third world nations_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Generals, which deploy your bombers, subs, and overseas missiles_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You will also construct and operate 6 different kinds of buildings:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Factories, which produce submarines and aircraft_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Research Facilities, which allow you to improve your position in 5 different technology tracks_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Reactors, which produce nukes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Silos, which are armed with ICBMs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Test Sites, which allow you to detonate nukes in your own territory for points_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- ABM Launchers, which earn defensive bonuses against various threats_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Minutes to Midnight is a standalone game. It is part of The Manhattan Project line from Minion Games._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
